remarks:
A theorem useful for eliminating the restricted existential uniqueness hypotheses in ~ riotaxfrd .  (Contributed by NM, 16-Jan-2012.) 

---

 A theorem useful for eliminating restricted existential uniqueness hypotheses.  (Contributed by NM, 16-Jan-2012.)
statement:
reuhypd.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. C ) -> B e. C ) $.
reuhypd.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. C /\ y e. C ) -> ( x = A <-> y = B ) ) $.
reuhypd $p |- ( ( ph /\ x e. C ) -> E! y e. C x = A ) $.
$d B y $.
$d C y $.
$d ph y $.
$d x y $.
